overview: From 2025-01-26 to 2025-02-02, elizaos/eliza had 262 new PRs (205 merged), 82 new issues, and 150 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Latest release version `v0.1.8-alpha.1` is NOT BUILDING

topIssues.title: Unable to get Discord to work as a channel. Infinite loop, <Lyra is typing...> infinitely
topIssues.author: actuallyrizzn

completedItems.title: fix: handle unsupported image provider
fix: ImageVisionModelProvider Not Applied in Runtime for Image Description Service
completedItems.body: The `imageVisionModelProvider` is used in the image description service, but its value is never applied at runtime. As a result, even if a user sets it in the character file, it has no effect. This PR ensures that the imageVisionModelProvid

completedItems.title: fix: Message id collision in Telegram Client
completedItems.body:
related: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/2796

The issue is caused by the message ID being used to create a UUID for memory. Since the message ID could be the same in different Telegram channels, it leads to collisions in memory c
